text: Hi all!! qq, is hubdb down? trying to access but im getting a blank page
and a 403 error in the console
nvm. it appears to be back

Hi all, i just found out that all my internal page links are outputted by HS without ‘https:’. They all start with “//” instead of “https://...“, which is causing an error in a SEO tool. Does anyone know how to fix this. When I check another HS-website, all the links are starting with https://... So I have no clue ... Anyone who can help me?
